CustomField.description: Generates a JSON feed of the Event Instances. See documentation on setup for use.
CustomField.formula: Community_Base_URL__c + 'services/apexrest/usteventfeed?eventId=' + Id + '&feedType=eventList&viewStart=' + TEXT(YEAR( Start_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(MONTH( Start_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(DAY(Start_Date__c))+ '+00:00:00' + '&viewEnd=' + TEXT(YEAR( End_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(MONTH( End_Date__c)) + '-' + TEXT(DAY(End_Date__c)) + '+24:59:59'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto-generated URL based on Event Instances. See documentation for use and setup.
CustomField.label: Event Instance Feed URL
